org.fujion.highcharts

Class AxisTitleOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.highcharts.AxisTitleOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter

    public class AxisTitleOptions
extends Options
    Options for an axis title.

    • Field Summary

      AxisTitleOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class org.fujion.ancillary.Options

        copyTo, toMap

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • align

        public String align
        Alignment of the title relative to the axis values. Possible values are "low", "middle" or "high". Defaults to "middle".

      • margin

        public Integer margin
        The pixel distance between the axis labels or line and the title. Defaults to 0 for horizontal axes, 10 for vertical.

      • offset

        public Integer offset
        The distance of the axis title from the axis line. By default, this distance is computed from the offset width of the labels, the labels' distance from the axis and the title's margin. However when the offset option is set, it overrides all this. Defaults to undefined.

      • rotation

        public Integer rotation
        The rotation of the text in degrees. 0 is horizontal, 270 is vertical reading from bottom to top. Defaults to 0.

      • style

        public final StyleOptions style
        CSS styles for the title. When titles are rotated they are rendered using vector graphic techniques and not all styles are applicable. Most noteworthy, a bug in IE8 renders all rotated strings bold and italic. Defaults to: 
             color: '#6D869F'
     fontWeight: 'bold'

      • text

        public String text
        The actual text of the axis title. It can contain basic HTML text markup like <b>, <i> and spans with style. Defaults to null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AxisTitleOptions

        public AxisTitleOptions()
